name: Chinese Zhuge Nu Rush
description: Uses the Song Dynasty for rapid [icon:villager] production. Overwhelms opponents with a mass of [icon:zhuge_nu] Zhuge Nu spam.

steps.description: Queue [icon:villager] villagers. Send 6 starting villagers to [icon:sheep] sheep. [icon:rally] Rally [icon:scout] scout to find sheep and scout enemy.
1st new [icon:villager] builds [icon:house] house, then [icon:mining_camp] Mining Camp on [icon:gold] gold.
Send next new [icon:villager] to [icon:gold] gold. (Total 2 on gold). Have [icon:imperial_official] Imperial Official supervise gold for tax.
Next new [icon:villager] builds [icon:lumber_camp] Lumber Camp on [icon:wood] wood. Send following villager to wood. (Total 2 on wood).
[icon:feudal_age] Age up with [icon:barbican_of_the_sun] Barbican of the Sun! Use 2 [icon:villager] villagers from [icon:food] food to build. Place defensively.
Immediately build [icon:imperial_academy] Imperial Academy to trigger [icon:upgrade] Song Dynasty. Use 3 builders for faster transition.
[icon:upgrade] Song Dynasty reached! Build 2 [icon:archery_range] Archery Ranges. Start [icon:zhuge_nu] Zhuge Nu production immediately.
[icon:attack] Mass production! Push with 15+ [icon:zhuge_nu] units. Have [icon:imperial_official] Imperial Official supervise ranges for faster recruitment.
